hero.title: Qanati Player
hero.subtitle: The Golden Standard for Premium Viewing
hero.description: More than just a media player, it's a cinema in your pocket. Your fastest way to activate your private server or start your independent business with professional features.

features.sectionSubtitle: We do not follow standards; we create them. Discover power in every click.

mediakit.title: Revolutionary MediaKit Engine
mediakit.description: Instant 4K/HDR playback with smooth zapping and zero stutter.

performance.title: Hardware & Network Intelligence
performance.description: Auto buffer tuning keeps streams stable on weak networks.

multiview.title: Professional Multi-View
multiview.description: Watch up to 4 sources with independent audio control.

pip.title: Picture-in-Picture (PiP)
pip.description: Keep watching while using other apps with a smart floating window.

glassmorphism.title: Glassmorphism UI
glassmorphism.description: Premium glass UI that keeps content front and center.

ai.title: AI-Powered Recommendations
ai.description: Smarter recommendations that surface what you actually want to watch.

voice.title: Cinematic Voice Search
voice.description: Find content fast with accurate voice search.

trailers.title: Smart Trailer System
trailers.description: Watch official trailers instantly to decide faster.

stats.title: Live Server Stats
stats.description: Live server insights to avoid interruptions.

commandCenter.title: Command Center
commandCenter.description: One place to control settings, privacy, and performance.

parentalControl.title: Parental Control
parentalControl.description: One-tap restrictions for a family-safe experience.

recording.title: Recording & Download Hub
recording.description: Save live streams in source quality for offline viewing.

audio.title: Premium Audio Interactions
audio.description: Subtle audio cues that make the experience feel premium.

predictive.title: Predictive Performance Mode
predictive.description: Faster navigation with predictive caching and instant response.

downloads.title: Download on Your Favorite Platforms
downloads.subtitle: Available now on Android, Smart TVs, and Windows.

about.title: About Us
about.tagline: We build what no one else does.

footer.warning: Warning: This project is protected by international intellectual property protocols. Digital fingerprints are embedded in code and UI to trace unauthorized copies. Legal action and account takedowns are immediate on any violation.
footer.note: Important: This app is a professional media player and does not include preloaded content. We provide the platform for merchants and server owners to activate and sell their services professionally.

nav.tagline: We build what others rely on

trust.title: Trusted by Millions Globally
trust.subtitle: We don't just sell subscriptions; we design gateways for unforgettable viewing

servers.label: Active Users
servers.description: A live experience for over 1 Million families worldwide who trust our standards.

ratings.label: Store Rating
ratings.description: We lead the industry with a 4.9/5 rating, the highest in its class.

startup.label: Response Speed
startup.description: Powered by MediaKit, streams start within just 0.4 seconds, the fastest globally.

updates.label: Security Updates
updates.description: Advanced protection system and weekly updates ensuring uninterrupted stability.

reseller.quote: Qanati Player isn't just an app; it's a leap in streaming stability. No more freezing or heating issues.

analyst.quote: After auditing the core engine, I can say this app is light years ahead of its competitors technically.
analyst.role: Eng. Ahmed Salem - Software Systems Analyst

whyUs.title: Why "Qanati Player"?
whyUs.subtitle: A clear breakdown of the difference between sovereign architecture and traditional commercial solutions.

instantOn.title: Instant-On Speed
instantOn.description: Channel playback in under 0.5s thanks to smart cache optimizations.

security.title: Technical Sovereignty
security.description: Fully encrypted infrastructure protecting your data and connection.

quality.title: 8K + AV1 Support
quality.description: Latest compression tech for highest quality at lower bandwidth.

mediakit.title: Why MediaKit Engine?
mediakit.subtitle: One Technical Heart.. Across All Platforms

unified.title: Unified Technical Sovereignty
unified.description: While other apps rely on default system players, we have our own unified engine. Experience the same pro performance on any device.

cooling.title: Absolute Stability & Cooling
cooling.description: No more overheating. Thanks to Smart Decoding, the engine runs with minimal CPU effort, saving battery and keeping your device cool.

formats.title: The Format Monster
formats.description: No format is out of reach. From 4K HDR to AV1, our engine devours all files with total smoothness.

s1.p: Qanati Tech ("we", "our", "the Company") is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect and protect your data when using Qanati Player ("the App").

s3.p: We use information to provide services, personalize experience, analyze performance, and communicate updates.

s4.p: We DO NOT sell your personal data. We only share it with tech partners for hosting or when required by law.

s5.p: We use advanced encryption and local storage to ensure maximum privacy for your subscription details.

s1.p: By using the App, you agree to comply with these terms and conditions in full.

s2.p: We grant you a limited, non-transferable license for personal, non-commercial use only.

s3.p: Qanati Player is a media player only. Users are responsible for providing legal content and obeying local laws.

s8.p: All rights are owned by Qanati Tech. Any unauthorized copying will lead to immediate legal action.

s1.p: Qanati Player is fully protected by international copyright laws and WIPO treaties.

s2.p: Warning: Unique digital watermarks are embedded in the code to trace any cloned version back to its source.

s5.p: Alert: In case of violation, we take immediate takedown actions, prosecution, and demand financial damages.

meta.title: Qanati Player - The Golden Standard for Premium Viewing
meta.description: Revolutionary media player with Glassmorphism design and superior performance.

items.a: No. It is a media player and requires your own subscription or server.
Android, Windows, and Smart TVs are supported now; more platforms are coming.
Yes, frequent updates for performance and security.
We use local storage and advanced encryption to protect your data.
